transcript:
Customer: Samajh hi nahi pa raha.
Last time bhi main isko ye samjha. Hello?
Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: To dekhiye maine whatsapp mein na sir aapko maine ek link bheja hua hai. Dekhiye zara.
Whatsapp mein sir link dikha aapko?
Executive: Sir, bol rahe hain hello whatsapp.
Customer: Haan?
Executive: Sir, pehle aap mujhe whatsapp mein na ek message kariye.
Kuch bhi mujhe whatsapp mein message kijiye aap.
Uske sir main aapko guide karta hu kaise sir waha pe aapko number show hoga.
Hello?
Customer: Haan haan sir whatsapp pe sir aapko dekhiye ek message aaya?
Executive: Aaya message aaya.
Customer: Aap sir usse mujhe kuch hi ka reply kijiye. Hi kariye tab sir aapko link open ho jayegi. Abhi link nahi open ho rahi hogi na?
Fir jaise hi aap us link pe click karenge na aap seedhe video meet pe aa jayenge. Ab join now pe click karenge to.
Nahi to sir apan ek kaam kar sakte hain. Aapke paas IndiaMART ka app hai?
Hello?
Executive: Sir apne paas IndiaMART ka app hai application IndiaMART B2B marketplace karke hoga.
Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan sir apne paas IndiaMART ha ha hi bheja hai.
Customer: Haan haan hi bheje. Message aa raha hai na hi.
Executive: Ji ji.
Ab
link bheja hai link mein click kariye.
Ispe sir click kariye join kariye.

Hanji sir dekhiye. Hello. Sir aapne join kara?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan sir is link pe click kariye. Join ho raha hai aapko?
Executive: Haan join ho raha.
Customer: Haan.
Sir join sir abhi aapne to meeting join nahi kari hai.
Us link pe click kariye ek jagah sir join now likha hoga Z O I N karke hoga sir usme click kijiye.
Sir aapke aas pass koi aur hai jisse main baat kar sakta
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi koi nahi hai.
Customer: Aap akele hain abhi? Ji akele hi hai. Haan. Sir jab aapne us link pe click kara tha to aapko kya dikh ke aa raha tha?
Executive: Meri screen nahi aa raha hai.
Customer: Kuch nahi aa raha?
Executive: Kuch nahi aa raha.
Customer: To sir ek kaam kariye aap IndiaMART ka application kholiye. IndiaMART B2B marketplace karke hoga aap wo application kholiye. Dekhta hai jo hamara staff hai aane se aapko phone karega. Dekhiye sir aap na sir mera number save kar lijiye aapko side mein gaya side se aane se aapko contact karega.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is unable to join the meeting.

Resolution:

- Executive guided to join via link on WhatsApp.

- Executive guided to join via IndiaMART application.

Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- meeting, join, link, application
